name: .ELD File Extension
summary: Learn about .ELD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Before attempting to open an ELD file, you should rename it to use the .ldt extension. This will allow you to open the file in programs that support the Elumudat format, such as DIAL LDT Editor (Windows), Meduza Photometric Toolset (Windows), and DIAL DIALux Evo (Windows).

Alternatively, you can open an ELD file in Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or any other text editor, to view the plain text data it contains. However, it's far better to open an ELD file in LDT Editor or another program that shows the file's data in an understandable format.

After renaming your ELD file to use the .ldt extension, you can convert it to other formats using either the PhotoView module included in OxyTech LITESTAR 4D Open or the online Eulumdat Tools ELUMDAT to IES Converter tool. LITESTAR 4D Open can convert LDT files to the following formats:
CIE - International Commission on Illumination Data
Eulumdat Tools ELUMDAT to IES Converter can convert LDT files to the IES format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
